Bay Area Coronavirus Relief Organization

We are a coalition of students from many different schools from all around the Bay Area working to collect donations to help people both on the front lines and those in dire need.

Baycro is Now Collecting 3D Printed Supplies

Now that we have acquired the necessary equipment to work with such items, we have expanded our type of donations to 3D printed personal protective equipment.

Donate

Baycro collects donations in multiple ways and provides methods to communicate with donors to make donation as simple as possible. Check out our donation page to learn more.

In addition, we also have accept monetary donations on our Gofundme .

3D Printing

We now collect 3D printed parts to donate. If you are interested in 3D printing for us, please check out printing page so you are aware of the requirements and donation procedure.

Join Us

Baycro is a student led organization, with people in each school conducting their own donation drives to collect as many supplies as possible. Anyone is welcome to join under the goal of helping other during these times.

Sponsors

A big thank you to our current sponsors:



If you would like to sponsor us, please check out our sponsor page to get in touch with us.
